Santa_Rosa.McDonald Mansion:
The McDonald Mansion, also known as Mableton, is an historic residence in Santa Rosa, California.
It was built in 1877 in the Victorian Stick/Eastlake style as a summer home for the McDonald Family, whose primary residence was in San Francisco. In 1959 Mabelton's exterior was used in the filming of Walt Disney's Pollyanna.
The McDonald Mansion is currently owned by technology entrepreneur John Webley.
